alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 7:17AM MDT until October 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Georgetown Lake, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth, Butte, MacDonald Pass, Homestake Pass, and Highway 12 Garrison to Elliston * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Expect periods of reduced visibility during heavier snow showers.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Butte, Blackfoot Region; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
